CARC.BA.summary: Carboclor S.A. provides port, storage, and logistics services in Argentina. The company's logistics services include tax court services for trucks and containers; reception, storage, and dispatch of chemical, agro-industrial, and fuel products by lines, trucks, barges, and ships; drum fractionation, logistics warehouse storage, and delivery; blending of controlled products; special requirements, such as heating in tanks and lines; inertization and blanketing of tanks and cisterns; spill prevention; final disposal of slop and waste treatment with certification; and boat service cranes. It also offers laboratory services. Carboclor S.A. was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Campana, Argentina. Carboclor S.A. is a subsidiary of Ancsol S.A.
